Archery_trainer.mqttClient

Class MqttClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • Archery_trainer.mqttClient.MqttClient

  • public class MqttClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for listening the MQTT topic where messages from the embedded device are published. To test this you will need to have a certificate and a private key from Amazon IoT. Also a key store file needs to be generated for these certificates. Need to think about how to handle this so that everyone has access. This is tested in a maven project where the key store file is stored in src/main/resources and the pom file includes: com.amazonaws aws-iot-device-sdk-java 1.1.1 com.amazonaws aws-iot-device-sdk-java-samples 1.1.1
